summary: This is an email chain from April 3, 2020, discussing updates on the Epstein matter. It references earlier messages from August 24, 2019, about coordinating daily updates and separating issues by topic (HT, death, drugs, PC) to be pushed through the Violent Crime Unit.

persons.name: IMIE
persons.context: Appears as the sender of an email on August 24, 2019, acknowledging receipt of a message about handling updates on the Epstein matter.

persons.name: CID
persons.context: Mentioned as a source of messages confirming the need for daily updates on the Epstein matter, preferring informal situation reports.

connections.description: Both are involved in FBI communications regarding updates on the Epstein matter, as indicated in the email chain.
Both are mentioned as sources of messages about daily updates on the Epstein matter, showing coordination within the FBI.

events.title: Coordination on Epstein updates
events.description: FBI personnel exchanged messages confirming the need to return to daily updates on the Epstein matter, with preferences for informal situation reports over full SCNs.

events.title: Email update on Epstein matter
events.description: An email was sent discussing the ongoing Epstein investigation, referencing earlier coordination and topic separation (HT, death, drugs, PC) for updates through the Violent Crime Unit.

keyFacts: The document is an email from April 3, 2020, referencing earlier FBI communications about the Epstein investigation from August 24, 2019.
FBI personnel (EM and CID) confirmed the need for daily updates on the Epstein matter, preferring informal situation reports over full SCNs.
The update strategy involved separating issues by topic: HT, death, drugs, and PC, to be pushed through the Violent Crime Unit.
